official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act in order to exempt motor vehicles purchased by persons residing in certain rural areas from certain emission control requirements.

summary.text: Exempts motor vehicles purchased by persons residing in certain rural areas from certain emission control requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act in order to exempt motor vehicles purchased by persons residing in certain rural areas from certain emission control requirements.
